trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a managed assembly is found but cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 找到托管程序集但不能加载时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Represents the error that occurs when a <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> file is found but cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 表示出现的错误时<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>文件找到，但不能加载。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException> exception is thrown when the file fails to load because it cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>文件无法加载，因为它不能定位时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If the file is located, but cannot be loaded due to insufficient permissions, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果该文件所在的但不能加载由于权限不足，而<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>引发。

trans-unit.source: `FileLoadException` has the default HRESULT of COR_E_FILELOAD, which has the value 0x80131621, but this is not the only possible HRESULT.
trans-unit.target: `FileLoadException` 具有默认 COR_E_FILELOAD HRESULT，它具有值 0x80131621，但这不是唯一可能的 HRESULT。

trans-unit.source: If your code does not have <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A> permission, the error message for this exception may only contain file or directory names instead of fully qualified paths.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的代码不具有<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A>权限，错误消息，此异常可能仅包含文件或目录的名称，而不是完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: This exception is not included in the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), but it is thrown by some members that are.
trans-unit.target: 此异常未包含在[.NET for Windows Store 应用](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)，但它将引发的某些成员。

trans-unit.source: To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement for <xref:System.IO.IOException> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要在这种情况下捕获异常，编写`catch`语句<xref:System.IO.IOException>相反。

trans-unit.source: **Associated Tips**
trans-unit.target: **相关的提示**

trans-unit.source: **Make sure that the file is a valid .NET Framework assembly.**
trans-unit.target: **请确保该文件是有效的.NET Framework 程序集。**

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown if the file is not a valid .NET Framework assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件不是有效的 .NET Framework 程序集，则会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>。

trans-unit.source: **Check to make sure an assembly or module was not loaded twice with two different evidences.**
trans-unit.target: **检查以确保一个程序集或模块时不会加载两次用两个不同的证据。**

trans-unit.source: Evidence is the set of information that constitutes input to security policy decisions, such as what permissions can be granted to code.
trans-unit.target: 证据是输入安全策略决策的一组信息（如代码可授予哪些权限）。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.GacRemove%2A> and <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Evidence%2A>
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.GacRemove%2A>和<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Evidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: **If using the RegisterAssembly or UnregisterAssembly methods, check to make sure the assembly name is not longer than MAX_PATH characters.**
trans-unit.target: **如果使用 RegisterAssembly 或 UnregisterAssembly 方法，请检查以确保程序集名称不超过 MAX_PATH 个字符。**

trans-unit.source: The assembly name's length cannot exceed MAX_PATH.
trans-unit.target: 程序集名称的长度不能超过 MAX_PATH。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.RegisterAssembly%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.UnRegisterAssembly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.RegisterAssembly%2A> 和 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.UnRegisterAssembly%2A>。

trans-unit.source: **If loading a satellite assembly, make sure the specified CultureInfo matches the file's CultureInfo.**
trans-unit.target: **如果加载附属程序集，请确保指定的 CultureInfo 与文件的 CultureInfo 匹配。**

trans-unit.source: Satellite assemblies contain localized resources which contain non-localizable executable code and resources for a single culture that serve as the default or neutral culture.
trans-unit.target: 附属程序集包含本地化资源，这些资源包含单个区域性（用作默认或非特定区域性）的非本地化可执行代码和资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetSatelliteAssembly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetSatelliteAssembly%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> class, setting the <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Could not load the specified file."
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> 类的新实例，将新实例的 <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> 属性设置为描述错误的系统提供的消息（如“无法加载指定文件”）。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property and <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A> property of the new instance are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性和<xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A>属性的新实例初始化为`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述该错误的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The content of <c>message</c> is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 消息的内容被设计为人可理解的形式<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.Message%2A> property of the new instance using `message`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.Message%2A>属性的新实例使用`message`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property and <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A> property of the new instance are initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性和<xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A>属性的新实例初始化为`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述该错误的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The content of <c>message</c> is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 消息的内容被设计为人可理解的形式<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: `InnerException` 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 `InnerException`。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information on inner exceptions, see <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关内部异常的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述该错误的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The content of <c>message</c> is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 消息的内容被设计为人可理解的形式<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the file that was not loaded.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" />，它包含未加载的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> class with a specified error message and the name of the file that could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定错误信息和不能加载的文件的名称来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.Message%2A> property of the new instance using `message` and the <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A> property using `fileName`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.Message%2A>属性的新实例使用`message`和<xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A>属性使用`fileName`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property of the new instance is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性的新实例初始化为`null`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A> is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access to streams.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A> 不需要是存储在磁盘; 上的文件它可以是系统的支持访问流的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on the system, this class might be able to access a physical device.
trans-unit.target: 例如，具体取决于系统中，此类可能能够访问物理设备。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述该错误的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The content of <c>message</c> is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 消息的内容被设计为人可理解的形式<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the file that was not loaded.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" />，它包含未加载的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> class with a specified error message, the name of the file that could not be loaded, and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误信息、不能加载的文件的名称和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: `InnerException` 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 `InnerException`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A> is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access to streams.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A> 不需要是存储在磁盘; 上的文件它可以是系统的支持访问流的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on the system, this class might be able to access a physical device.
trans-unit.target: 例如，具体取决于系统中，此类可能能够访问物理设备。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information on inner exceptions, see <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关内部异常的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the file that causes this exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取导致该异常的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the file with the invalid image, or a null reference if no file name was passed to the constructor for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含具有无效图像的文件的名称；或者，如果没有将文件名传递给当前实例的构造函数，则为空引用。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the name of the file supplied to the constructor for the current instance, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果有的话，此属性将返回为当前实例的构造函数提供的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the file name was not specified or is a null reference, this property returns a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件名未指定或为空引用，此属性将返回空引用。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Gets the log file that describes why an assembly load failed.
trans-unit.target: 获取描述程序集加载失败的原因的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: A string containing errors reported by the assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 一个 String，包含由程序集缓存报告的错误。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: to provide evidence and view and modify policy.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供证据以及查看和修改策略。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the file name and additional exception information.
trans-unit.target: 使用文件名和其他异常信息来设置 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: to provide evidence and view and modify policy.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供证据以及查看和修改策略。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取错误消息和引发此异常的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 包含错误消息和引发此异常的文件名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将替代<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If no message was supplied to the constructor for the current exception, this property returns a system-supplied error message.
trans-unit.target: 如果为当前异常的构造函数不硅酮任何消息，此属性将返回系统提供的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A> property is not a null reference, the message includes the file name, for example, "Unable to load file a `FileName`."
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A>属性不为空引用，该消息包含文件名，例如，"无法加载文件`FileName`。"

trans-unit.source: (a `FileName` represents the value returned by <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A>.) If <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A> is `null`, this is indicated in the system-supplied message as "(null)".
trans-unit.target: (`FileName`表示返回的值<xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A>。)如果<xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A>是`null`，这指示在系统提供消息中作为"(null)"。

trans-unit.source: The system-supplied message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 系统提供的消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the fully qualified name of the current exception, and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前异常的完全限定名，还可能返回错误信息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the fully qualified name of this exception, and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace, depending on which <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> constructor is used.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它包含此异常的完全限定名，还可能包含错误信息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪（取决于所使用的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileLoadException" /> 构造函数）。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写 <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The string representation returned by this method includes the name of the exception, the value of the <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.Message%2A> the value of the <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A> property, and the result of calling <xref:System.Environment.StackTrace%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的字符串表示形式包括的异常的值名称<xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.Message%2A>的值<xref:System.IO.FileLoadException.FileName%2A>属性，以及调用的结果<xref:System.Environment.StackTrace%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If any of these members is a null reference, its value is not included in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何这些成员为空引用，其值不是包括在返回的字符串。
